column1: # Synapse Framework Standard Partition Table for 4MB Flash with OTA and SPIFFS
# The 'Offset' column is left blank to allow the build system to automatically
# calculate the starting address for each partition.
# 1. NVS partition for key-value storage (used by Storage Manager's NVS backend)
# 2. PHY data partition for RF calibration data
# 3. OTA app partitions (two partitions for safe updates)
# Size is set to 1.8MB per app partition
# 4. SPIFFS partition for file storage (used by Storage Manager's SPIFFS backend)
# The label 'spiffs' must match the one in Kconfig.
